kw.msg: Executing command 'export OS_CLOUD=openstack_helm && openstack compute service list --service nova-compute|grep controller-0|awk '{print$10}''.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Get From Dictionary
kw.doc: Returns a value from the given ``dictionary`` based on the given ``key``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Wait Until Keyword Succeeds
kw.doc: Runs the specified keyword and retries if it fails.

kw.name: Check Compute Service Property
kw.doc: Check status instance.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Catenate
kw.doc: Catenates the given items together and returns the resulted string.
kw.msg: ${cmd} = openstack compute service list --service nova-compute|grep controller-0|awk '{print$10}'

kw.doc: Keyword to execute exclusively commands for OpenStack as it uses the proper token for OS authentication.
